channel.title: Running a client from a .exe program
channel.description:
Hey i was wondering if its possible to run your client from a .exe program. I'm not about to jar files for some reason (i use to be able to) but now when i do it it says "could not find main-class: client. Program will exit"... So i just wanted to know if someone could show me how to make it run from a .exe application. I've seen it done before. i just don't know how.
Thanks!
